        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> Edge<I,E> create(I id,
                                                                                                           E value)
        Create an edge pointing to a given ID with a value
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex ID type
        E - Edge Value type
        参数:
        id - target ID
        value - edge value
        返回:
        Edge pointing to ID with value
